wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Damian Webber (born 15 May 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender. He most recently played for Wigan Athletic.

response: In June 2002 Tom Pyle, head of Arctic Section of the Office of Polar Programs within the National Science Foundation of the United States tasked Patrick Webber (President of the International Arctic Science Committee - IASC), and Craig Tweedie (then at Michigan State University) with scoping and developing the CEON concept.
